channel.title: CVE Feed for ThemePrix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ThemePrix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-34572|2024-08-02T02:59:21.697Z -- themeprix -- fancy%20elementor%20flipbox
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemePrix Fancy Elementor Flipbox fancy-elementor-flipbox allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Fancy Elementor Flipbox: from n/a through 2.4.2.
